what: A R package of Hamilton, Ontario destinations
title: A R package of Hamilton, Ontario destinations
text: HamONdests data-package contains growing set destinations estimated ‘supplies’ Hamilton, Ontario, Canada. currently contains schools, contain municipally-owned land, health care health residential care facilities. aim data-package facilitate calculation accessibility mobility measures transportation planning context. majority data sourced Hamilton’s Open Data Portal augmented additional open data higher levels government (provincial federal), predicted values, /data OpenStreetMap. HamONdests package still work progress available vignettes can viewed .

title: A R package of Hamilton, Ontario destinations

title: A R package of Hamilton, Ontario destinations

what: hamONdests: A R package of Hamilton, Ontario destinations — hamONdests-package
title: hamONdests: A R package of Hamilton, Ontario destinations — hamONdests-package
text: package includes destinations associated quality information Hamilton, Ontario, Canada. data package consists destination sourced City Hamilton (Ontario, Canada) sources, including Hamilton Open Data portal augmented estimated qualities 'capacities'. package also includes associated spatial boundary files.

what: The elementary and secondary public schools in Hamilton for the 2010-2011 and 2015-2016 academic years. — Schools_2011_2016

title: The elementary and secondary public schools in Hamilton for the 2010-2011 and 2015-2016 academic years. — Schools_2011_2016
The elementary and secondary public schools in Hamilton for the 2010-2011 and 2015-2016 academic years. — Schools_2011_2016
text: simple feature class (sf) point object containing 177 rows 19 variables; row represents school associated geo-referenced geometry. SchoolID unique identifier school. Name name school CID2011 unique ID 2010-2011 catchment associated school; includes 'public' 'catholic' school catchments CID2016 unique ID 2015-2016 catchment associated school; includes 'public' 'catholic' schools catchments System type school system, either public ("Public") public catholic ("Catholic") Level level school education, either elementary ("Elementary") secondary ("Secondary") educates children typically ages 3 14 years, 14 years 18 years, respectively. Year academic year corresponds schools location. Either "2011" (2010-2011 academic year), "2016" (2015-2016 academic year) "2011 2016" (academic years). See "Status" variable additional information. Status status school relative 2015-2016 academic year; options either "New" (existed 2015-2016 ), "Removed" (existed 2010-2011 , 2015-2016), "Moved" (different locations 2010-2011 vs. 2015-2016), "Expanded" (building expanded 2010-2011 2015-2016 years), "NoChange" (change 2010-2011 2015-2016). ON_Enrol_2011 number students enrolled school 2010-2011 academic year. ON_Enrol_2016 number students enrolled school 2015-2016 academic year. footprint2011 area building footprint calculated digitized polygon retrieved OpenStreetMaps (~2011) footprint2016 area building footprint calculated digitized polygon retrieved OpenStreetMaps (~2016) ELEM Dummy variable indicating school Elementary school (eduactes children typically ages 3 14 years) MID Dummy variable indicating school Middle school (eduactes older elementary-aged children typically ages 11 14 years. NOTE: ELEM MID, MID ELEM.) HIGH Dummy variable indicating school Secondary school (eduactes children typically ages 14 18 years) urban.dist --crow-flies distance CBD (lat-long coordinate "King St W James St S: (43.256684, -79.869039). OTGC2011 estimated --ground-capacity (OTGC) school 2010-2011 academic year. province-estimated value many student can educated facility; values available schools, estimated using regression model. See documentation details. OTGC2016 estimated --ground-capacity (OTGC) school 2015-2016 academic year. province-estimated value many student can educated facility; values available schools, estimated using regression model. See documentation details. geometry point geometry.

title: The elementary and secondary public schools in Hamilton for the 2010-2011 and 2015-2016 academic years. — Schools_2011_2016
text: "school coordinates catchments provided Hamilton Wentworth District School Board (HWDSB) Hamilton Wentworth Catholic District School Board (HWCDSB) respective academic years (2010-2011 2015-2016) via author correspondence. real enrolment numbers 2010-2011 2015-2016 academic years retrieved government Ontario open data database. --ground-capacity schools estimated based building footprints (retrieved via OpenStreetMap archived 2011 2016 satellite images), level school (elementary, middle, secondary), CBD distance 'Public" "Catholic" schools. estimated OTGC validated handful OTGC values scrapped School Profiles publicly available certain schools (~40 schools, see data-raw).

The catchments associated with the elementary and secondary public schools in Hamilton for the  2010-2011 and 2015-2016 academic years. — School_Catchments_2011_2016
text: simple feature class (sf) polygon object containing 305 rows 5 variables; row represents unique planning region associated geo-referenced geometry. CID unique ID associated catchment. Year academic year corresponds schools location. Either "2011" (2010-2011 academic year), "2016" (2015-2016 academic year) "2011 2016" (academic years). See "Status" variable additional information. Level level school education, either elementary ("Elementary") secondary ("Secondary") educates children typically ages 3 14 years, 14 years 18 years, respectively. System type school system, either public ("Public") public catholic ("Catholic") geometry sfc polygon geometry (boundaries).
